service.name: metrics_monitor_process_percent
service.label: Percent Metrics Monitors Available
service.description: This alert is triggered if a percentage of Metrics Monitor processes are not up and listening on the network for the configured warning and critical thresholds.

METRICS_COLLECTOR.name: ams_metrics_collector_process
METRICS_COLLECTOR.label: Metrics Collector Process
METRICS_COLLECTOR.description: This alert is triggered if the Metrics Collector cannot be confirmed to be up and listening on the configured port for number of seconds equal to threshold.

METRICS_COLLECTOR.name: ams_metrics_collector_hbase_master_process
METRICS_COLLECTOR.label: Metrics Collector - HBase Master Process
METRICS_COLLECTOR.description: This alert is triggered if the Metrics Collector's HBase master processes cannot be confirmed to be up and listening on the network for the configured critical threshold, given in seconds.

METRICS_COLLECTOR.name: ams_metrics_collector_hbase_master_cpu
METRICS_COLLECTOR.label: Metrics Collector - HBase Master CPU Utilization
METRICS_COLLECTOR.description: This host-level alert is triggered if CPU utilization of the Metrics Collector's HBase Master exceeds certain warning and critical thresholds. It checks the HBase Master JMX Servlet for the SystemCPULoad property. The threshold values are in percent.

METRICS_COLLECTOR.name: ams_metrics_collector_zookeeper_server_process
METRICS_COLLECTOR.label: Metrics Collector - ZooKeeper Server Process
METRICS_COLLECTOR.description: This host-level alert is triggered if the Metrics Collector's ZooKeeper server process cannot be determined to be up and listening on the network.

METRICS_MONITOR.name: ams_metrics_monitor_process
METRICS_MONITOR.label: Metrics Monitor Status
METRICS_MONITOR.description: This alert indicates the status of the Metrics Monitor process as determined by the monitor status script.
